commits.subject: Replace customer service image with analytics iceberg visualization

- Remove old FinServ customer service image
- Update image reference in index.html

commits.subject: Merge pull request #8 from illuminAI-select/claude/optimize-mobile-visibility-fa2yZ
commits.body: Optimize mobile performance for visibility preset updates

commits.subject: Optimize mobile performance for visibility preset updates
commits.body:
Performance improvements:
- Replace Set-based random selection with efficient Fisher-Yates shuffle
- Add debouncing (300ms) to prevent rapid successive updates
- Batch DOM updates using requestAnimationFrame for smoother rendering
- Only modify squares that need class changes (avoid unnecessary reflows)
- Add loading state to prevent simultaneous update conflicts
- Auto-trigger visualization update after preset selection

These optimizations significantly reduce resource usage on mobile devices
when using quick visibility presets.

commits.subject: Merge pull request #7 from illuminAI-select/claude/improve-input-ux-k5fvi
commits.body: Improve input UX with clearer wording and mobile-friendly controls

commits.subject: Improve input UX with clearer wording and mobile-friendly controls
commits.body:
- Replace technical jargon with user-friendly labels
  - "Communication Channel Inputs" â†’ "Adjust Your Channels"
  - "Analyzed %" â†’ "Visibility"
  - "Enabled" â†’ "Active"
  - "Reshuffle" â†’ "Update Visualization"
  - "Distribute Remaining %" â†’ "Auto-Balance Channels"

- Add helpful contextual descriptions throughout the UI
  - Main help text explaining what the tool does
  - Section explanations for preset buttons
  - Inline help text for each control ("% of total data", "How much you can see")

- Improve mobile touch interaction
  - Add +/- stepper buttons for easier value adjustment on mobile
  - Replace cramped sliders with touch-friendly number inputs
  - Keep sliders visible on desktop only
  - Larger touch targets (44x44px minimum)

- Enhance visual hierarchy and layout
  - Better structured control rows with clear labels
  - Lock icon (ðŸ”’) instead of checkbox for locking channels
  - Separated sections with descriptive headings
  - Improved spacing and typography

This makes the interface intuitive for users without context while maintaining all functionality.

commits.subject: Merge pull request #6 from illuminAI-select/claude/mobile-responsive-restructure-OTCPC
commits.body: Restructure project with mobile-first responsive design

commits.subject: Restructure project with mobile-first responsive design
commits.body:
- Implemented industry-standard project structure with assets folders
- Separated concerns: external CSS and JavaScript files
- Enhanced mobile responsiveness with mobile-first approach
- Added proper touch targets (44px minimum) for mobile devices
- Improved responsive breakpoints: 480px, 768px, 1024px, 1280px
- Optimized layout to stack on mobile, side-by-side on desktop
- Added semantic HTML5 elements and accessibility attributes
- Updated README with project structure and features documentation

The index.html remains in root for GitHub Pages compatibility.
